Download PySkein¶

New in version 0.3.1:
  • Improved demo script threefish
  • Better compatibility with Python 3.1
Download:
  • Source distribution: pyskein-0.3.1.tar.gz (sig)
  • Windows installer (only for Python 3.1): pyskein-0.3.1.win32-py3.1.exe (sig)

Previous versions¶

  • PySkein 0.3
    • New in this version:
      • Threefish block decryption
      • Demo scripts skeinsum and threefish

    • Source: pyskein-0.3.tar.gz (sig)

  • PySkein 0.2
    • New in this version:
      • Support for message authentication codes
      • Threefish block encryption (but no decryption)
      • Fixed one or two reference leaks

    • Source: pyskein-0.2.tar.gz (sig)

  • PySkein 0.1
    • New in this version:
      • Skein-256, Skein-512, and Skein-1024 hashing

    • Source: pyskein-0.1.tar.gz (sig)
